title: Neeko Bug in Nexus Blitz (U.R.F. Mode)
body:
a critical bug can happen during the URF event where Neeko cannot use her ult for the rest of the game. I think it may be triggered by dying during the wind-up animation with a very low ult CD. Very annoying, pls fix.

From AstreaPBE 
This Bug is still in the Game
